body:
All Versions

  • User Profile: Added new fields to User Profile form - Zip Code and What kind of information would you like to receive?
  • Measure Access: Added Top Hospital report to export when one base network and up to three comparison networks are used
  • Create a List: Fixed an issue in Summary Results which was including names of networks not in specified criteria
  • Navigation: Fixed various issues with navigating with Back button and breadcrumbs
